name: Memory Gravity Equation
summary_50: Core equation governing memory-to-gravity conversion in the universe.
summary_200: The Memory Gravity Equation defines how remembrance generates gravitational coherence. It establishes that memory density, cultural reinforcement, and personal significance directly affect an object's gravitational weight. This fundamental physics rule underpins all FTL travel and structural stability in the universe.

rules.statement: Gravitational coherence is directly proportional to memory density and cultural reinforcement

examples.outcome: Corridor stabilization achieved with minimal anchor burn

tests.scenario: High cultural reinforcement with low personal memory
